title: 05x3: Post-Government Employment Restrictions Applied to a Former Senior Employee Now Employed by a Government Contractor
summary: OGE discusses applicability of 18 U.S.C. § 207 to a former senior employee.  OGE discusses 18 U.S.C. § 207(c), "intent to influence," and the special knowledge exception in 18 U.S.C. § 207(j)(4).
